item.title: About
item.description: Open Universe The code repository is hosted on GitHub. If you have found a bug in the game or have an idea about a feature, please open an issue in the issue tracker. See the README file for more information. Website This website is under the MIT license. All files for the website are on GitHub. The website is built with Hugo with the Ananke theme. The Feed icon on the RSS page is from unnamed (Mozilla Foundation) - feedicons.

item.title: RSS Feed
item.description: If you want to receive the RSS Feed for the entire website https://independent-eye2446.github.io/OpenUniverse-Website/index.xml If you want to receive the RSS Feed only for Posts https://independent-eye2446.github.io/OpenUniverse-Website/posts/index.xml
